scripts.check:metadata-lifecycle: PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=.playwright dotenv -e .env -- npx playwright test tests/metadata-lifecycle.spec.ts --project=chromium
scripts.check:metadata-auth: PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=.playwright dotenv -e .env -- npx playwright test tests/metadata-auth.spec.ts --project=chromium
scripts.prisma:generate:metadata: rm -rf apps/metadata-api/prisma && cp -R prisma/metadata apps/metadata-api/prisma && export METADATA_DATABASE_URL=$(dotenv -e .env -- node scripts/metadata/resolve-db-url.cjs) && PRISMA_GENERATE_SKIP_AUTOINSTALL=1 dotenv -e .env -- pnpm --dir apps/metadata-api prisma generate --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.migrate:metadata: rm -rf apps/metadata-api/prisma && cp -R prisma/metadata apps/metadata-api/prisma && export METADATA_DATABASE_URL=$(dotenv -e .env -- node scripts/metadata/resolve-db-url.cjs) && dotenv -e .env -- pnpm --dir apps/metadata-api prisma migrate deploy --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.migrate:metadata:dev: rm -rf apps/metadata-api/prisma && cp -R prisma/metadata apps/metadata-api/prisma && export METADATA_DATABASE_URL=$(dotenv -e .env -- node scripts/metadata/resolve-db-url.cjs) && dotenv -e .env -- pnpm --dir apps/metadata-api prisma migrate dev --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.start:metadata: pnpm prisma:generate:metadata && pnpm migrate:metadata && pnpm dev:metadata-stack
